The basic [[Resource|resource]] '''Iron Ore''' was introduced with the [[Game updates/2018-04-03| April 3, 2018 game update]] and is used in the recipes of various items of the [[Expertise|expertise]] :Bookgreen: level that came with this [[Advanced Crafting]]. 

=Properties=
For droprate research please consult [[Talk:{{PAGENAME}}]].
